reviews.customers_say: Customers find the cardigan to be of good quality, with a perfectly oversized fit and soft, cozy feel.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft warm and oversized…I love it!
items.body: Love love this sweater! I asked for another as a Christmas gift even. It’s soft and warm and I love the exposed seaming. I’m always cold in the house and this is great to throw on. I’ve seen reviews that the button holes are not finished and that’s true. I wear it closed and leave the top two unbuttoned and pull it over my head. I can see how it could be a problem if you wanted to wear it open often and they got a lot of wear and tear. I got the khaki color in a small, , I’m 5’7” 125# and it’s still really oversized. I love the way the sleeves are made, gives some extra style. Overall I’m very happy with this sweater! Read more
items.author: Janet porter

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The BEST sweater
items.body: This sweater is a new staple in my wardrobe! The quality is phenomenal and I keep getting compliments on it! I sized up wanting it to be mega oversized (pregnant) and it’s PERFECT. It’s the exact color and style as in the pictures. It’s warm but not heavy. It’s SO comfy and the buttons make it look so fancy so you can be comfortable at work and feel like you’re wrapped in a soft throw blanket! Read more
items.author: Rylee Teigen

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars So Love This Sweater!
items.body: There’s only one wrong thing with the sweater – the gold buttons. They look cheap and I prefer silver so I switched the buttons out and now it’s a stunner of a sweater. I wear a Cami underneath it because of the loose fit to give it a little extra warmth. The Dolman sleeves give it a very classy look. I’m a size 14–16 XL and a friend said that it made me even look smaller. The sweater has a bit of a stretch to it because of the material so I was able to use it by pulling it over my head and not having to button and unbutton it. Highly recommend. Read more
items.author: Valerie J Brooks

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft, cozy, and great everyday Cardigan Sweater!!
items.body: This brown cardigan is exactly what I was looking for. The color is beautiful and neutral, making it easy to style with so many outfits. The material is soft and comfortable, not itchy at all, and has a nice cozy feel without being too heavy. The fit is true to size with a relaxed look that layers really well over tees or tanks. It looks great dressed up or worn casually. Definitely a staple piece I’ll be reaching for often. Read more
items.author: Sarah

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fabulous Buy!
items.body: This sweater is very attractive on! I'm 5"10" and 165lbs. It's not too boxy. I have received oodles of compliments! It can be worn closed (I have worn it over slim fitting trousers) or open over a Tshirt or blouse. It's warm and cozy. Read more
items.author: Ken Evink

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Soft sweater
items.body: Warm and soft but pilled immediately and button holes are loose. Read more
items.author: Judith Stano

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Oversized, cute, and cozy!
items.body: Cute, oversized and cozy. I wore it buttoned with leggings one day and a few days later I wore it with a short dress and tights, unbuttoned. You can dress it up or down and it looks good. I want to buy more colors! I usually wear a size XL or 2X, even when I'm trying to up size, but I sized down to a medium and I'm glad I did because anything bigger I would have been drowning in it. I'm 5', 185 lbs. Read more
items.author: Ariana Montejano

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Fit
items.body: Amazon recommended that I get the extra large, but it was too big for me so I ended up having to send it back anyway and order another one. Read more
items.author: Customer

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Burgundy, Grey Blue, Apricot, Army Green, Black, Camel, Navy Blue, Dark Green, Pink, White, Grey, Light Khaki. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.
